tintuc.noidung: Summer after high school when we first met We make out in your Mustang to Radiohead And on my 18th birthday We got matching tattoos Used to steal your parents’ liquor And climb to the roof Talk about our future Like we had a clue Never planned on one day I’d be losing you

In another life I would be your girl We’d keep all our promises Be us against the world In another life I would make you stay So I don’t have to say You were the one that got away The one that got away
All this money can’t buy me a time machine, no Can’t replace you with a million rings, no I should have you told you what you meant to me, whoa ‘Cause now I pay the price
